General.Name: Shanghai New Centurion Network Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai New Centurion Network Information Technology Co., Ltd. offers information technology services in China. The company offers third-party engineering, operation, and maintenance services; sells original hardware, and software and services; and develops software products. Shanghai New Centurion Network Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
